Articles.Content:
Salutations, soldiers.

If you are here, it means you are a member of the R.K.M. in the MÃ¼nar Defence Division. If you are not, enlist now or leave.

Your mission, should you choose to accept it:

OBJECTIVE: Set up Amphibious Gear\'s beacons on the moon in a mare (crater) and return home within sight of the VAB. Video or image proof is required.

REWARD: An upgrade to your rank, shown with a change to your roster and signature

DEADLINE: Zero-hundred hours on the fifteenth day of the first month in the twelfth year of the first decade of the first century of the second millennium.

SIR

I HAVE COMPLETED THE OBJECTIVES

SIR

IMAGES ARE ATTACHED

SIR

SIR

I HAVE COMPLETED THE OBJECTIVES

SIR

IMAGES ARE ATTACHED

SIR

Well done, son.

I like your design.

Having been to the MÃ¼n and back several times, it was no trouble. It took me a couple tries to do it with the beacons, though.

And it took me 20 days!

I orbited several times, but I got it right.

I was this close to aborting. ||

Anyways, thank you sir!

THE KOLD WAR IS OVER!

The R.K.M wins 36-14!

Congratulations to Gojira for winning the contest! Expect your medal within a week.
